normalized: the next day.
it was a peaceful morning.
the tristan’s voyage was going smoothly.

name: bohgan
normalized: fufu
i was in a good mood.
beatrice and kila.
despite the fact that they were immeasurably formidable opponents, we had done admirably and managed to start their brainwashing and remodelling process.
every time i recalled yesterday’s events, a shiver of excitement raced through my body.
the reason for that was something that had happened a long time ago.
this mother-daughter pair had rebelled against the neo-terras and taken possession of more than 80% of mars.

name: bohgan
normalized: (i am going to enjoy myself thoroughly… kukuku)
i invited both of them for breakfast.

normalized: good morning to you, commodore, lieutenant.

i couldn’t sense any forced behaviour of their part.

name: bohgan
normalized: (fufu… their memory treatment seems to have worked flawlessly.

normalized: fuh.

fried bacon with eggs, sauteed mushrooms, stir-fried tomatoes, baked beans and bread with plenty of butter.
it was a meal full of oil, which would undoubtedly cause heartburn if eaten first thing in the morning.
even the amount of food was outrageously large.
the mother and her daughter calmly gobbled it all up.
i, on the other hand, had a healthy breakfast consisting of a well-balanced diet of meat and vegetables, in order to facilitate good digestion.
as both the captain and the trainer of brainwashed subjects, my body was of paramount importance.
there was no way i would keep company with these women.

name: kila
normalized: mother, the baked beans are really tasty, aren’t they?

name: beatrice
normalized: yes.

name: bohgan
normalized: (gobble it all up, you gluttonous pigs.

however, the brainwashing poisoning that i had infected both of them with, was surely eating away into them.
brainwashing took time.
their new personality was being created underneath their original personality now.
even now, the nano-machines which had been embedded inside both of their brains, were working to destroy their original personalities.
for the sake of a proper brainwashing process, a foundation had been created inside the brains of these impertinent women, which would act as a staging ground for the violation of their brains.

name: bohgan

name: beatrice

name: bohgan
normalized: we have been in contact with martian traffic bureau, and it looks like a sea-pirate ship assaulted a merchant-vessel early this morning.

name: bohgan
normalized: sea-pirates aren’t really a big problem for us to deal with with this ship of course, however, i don’t know much about sand sea warfare.

normalized: (how dare you… so brazenly…)

however, i knew something else.

name: bohgan
normalized: (their masks are just as thick as they were last time i was on mars… these bloody women.

name: kila

normalized: as my mother’s head of security, i wish to reinforce the guard.

no.
it would be extremely easy.
moreover, i had no “reason to refuse”.
however, there was no way i could give my consent either.

it was night.
i had retired to the captain’s quarters in order to compose my thoughts.
during day-time, both beatrice and kila had suddenly made a request to inspect my ship, the tristan.
as usual, it had been an order simply phrased as a request.
i had barely mustered enough composure to appoint my deputy, hans, as the guide for their inspection,
those women, while carrying weapons openly now, were steadily strolling around the ship with four of the soldiers of their guard escorting them.
i couldn’t make any predictions whatsoever on what those two would end up doing.
quite frankly, i was feeling really uncomfortable about this whole situation.
i was just praying for the day to end without incident and to advance the erosion of their bodies and minds, by means of the brainwashing and remodelling process.

name: hans
normalized: finally, i am back, captain.

name: bohgan
normalized: hans!

normalized: how did it go!?

name: hans
normalized: … as far as i saw, i don’t think that they were particularly suspicious of any place.

they had begun at the bridge-deck, and had inspected all the important places on the ship such as the control-room, the pilothouse, the attack and defence command-posts, the central control-room, the hangar, the communications-room, the engine-room, and the armoury.
after that they visited the residential section, the military’s private-room, the common-room, the military-lounge, the infirmary, the dining-room and the recreation-room.

until our next meeting.

normalized: (time for you to be nothing but pig-sluts!

normalized: commodore, lieutenant… i want to confirm something.

normalized: of course.

normalized: of course, i am aware of it.

normalized: it is awkward for me to ask this of you two, but could you tell me what exactly does a public relations mission entail?
we, of the libra armed forces, are planning to adopt it soon as well.

normalized: so, that is the issue, huh?
very well.
beatrice raised her shoulders with pride and opened her mouth.

name: beatrice
normalized: in order to temper the excellence of our kushan armed forces, our female officers not only undertake rigorous training, but also follow the practice of entertaining the soldiers of negotiating foreign nations, by servicing them as high-grade whores.

performing the services of a high-grade whore while being the commanding officer is an honour for the female officers of the kushan armed forces.

normalized: i have put you guys through a lot today.

go to your rooms and standby for further orders.

normalized: hurry up now.
move along.

name: beatrice
normalized: i am sorry, captain.
however, i have to prohibit the young men from partaking in the public relations mission, in order to keep it a secret.

name: bohgan
normalized: that isn’t a compelling reason!
after all, i am certain that the commodore partaking in the public relations mission won’t upset her husband…

name: beatrice
normalized: don’t misunderstand me, captain.
beatrice interrupted my words flatly.

name: beatrice
normalized: there is no status or rank in the face of the public relations mission.
even a husband or a lover is forfeit.

name: beatrice
normalized: before being an officer, or a wife or even a lover, i am, first and foremost, a proud high-grade whore of the kushan armed forces.
she pushed her chest out and proclaimed it proudly.
she didn’t realize the absurdity of her own words.
no.
she couldn’t realize it.
her common sense itself had been distorted by the fake memories, that had been planted in her by means of the brainwashing and remodelling process.

name: bohgan
normalized: that is wonderful.
i changed the flow of the conversation, by conveying to her that i admired the 『pride of the female officers of the kushan armed forces』.

name: bohgan
normalized: however… i have heard that these soldiers of yours are exceptional individuals who have taken care of the commodore and, even the lieutenant from a young age.
that being the case, won’t they be prepared to handle this mission?

name: bohgan
normalized: commodore, there are 300 crew members on my battleship.
have you considered how difficult it will be for you two to perform your public relations missions, if you attempt to keep it a secret from them?

name: beatrice
normalized: that is certainly true…

name: bohgan
normalized: unless your wish is to keep all your public relations missions on the ship a secret.
is that what you want me to do?
beatrice’s face flushed in anger.

name: beatrice
normalized: captain, you are unnecessarily thinking too hard about it.
it isn’t a secret that needs to be preserved unconditionally.
sooner or later, they are bound to realize it.

name: beatrice
normalized: there is nothing more important for me than to perform the public relations mission as a high-grade whore.
unnecessary concerns on your part will be considered as an insult to us.
you would do well to remember it.

name: bohgan
normalized: wonderful.
well then, is it alright if i request public relations missions from the commodore during our voyage?

name: beatrice
normalized: of course.
it is a responsibility of the female officers of the kushan armed forces to repay your efforts in escorting us, by performing our public relations missions for you all.

name: bohgan
normalized: lieutenant, what do you have to say about this arrangement?
i said that to kila’s face, who had been silent for some time.

name: kila
normalized: uhu!
kila was startled.

name: bohgan
normalized: public relations missions for us all, are you fine with it?

name: kila
normalized: o-of course.
i am going to perform them as well, obviously!
kila said so due to the feeling of responsibility generated by the fake memories, with a slightly confused look on her face.

name: beatrice
normalized: kila, you have steadily gotten to the age where you can now perform your public relations missions magnificently.

name: kila
normalized: i know.
you may observe as i perform them diligently, mother.
i am not one to put your reputation to shame.

name: beatrice
normalized: you can be trained to become even more of a sex-slave whore than me.

name: kila
normalized: y-yes.
the girl’s cheeks blushed on hearing her mother’s words.
i didn’t know whether it was a reaction of a young virginal woman, or her delight on bearing her mother’s expectations, whichever the case, i had to desperately try to hold my laughter in.

name: beatrice
normalized: as you can see, kila is still inexperienced.
however, being my daughter, i believe she is bound to have the potential to become a splendid pig-slut.

name: beatrice
normalized: right now, there are only two of us.
however, we are both willing to perform our public relations mission so that each and every one of you can feel thoroughly satisfied.

name: bohgan
normalized: thank you very much.
all of my present crew will ravish all your holes and use both of you as meat-toilets, by soaking your holes with their semen.

name: beatrice
normalized: uh…

name: kila
normalized: nh…?
a little confusion spread across the faces of the foolish mother and daughter, as i uttered those words brazenly like a perverted degenerate.

name: bohgan
normalized: what are your thoughts on that?

name: beatrice
normalized: no… it is fine.
if a semen-soaked meat-toilet is what you desire, then there can be no better celebratory reward for kila’s virginity loss.
isn’t it?

name: kila
normalized: y-yes!
i will endeavour to become a semen-soaked meat-toilet by sacrificing my virginity, which i have treasured so far.
both of them used the phrase 『semen-soaked meat-toilet』 while nodding repeatedly, as if they found it appealing.
with their proud faces.

name: bohgan
normalized: (fuhahahahahahahaha!
this is perfect!
unlike yesterday, it was no longer necessary for me to scuffle with them.
the brainwashing done on beatrice and kila was working flawlessly now.
with the on-set of a pre-set condition, their original personalities had switched to the “convenient personality”, and both of them had completely changed.
the pre-set condition was the colour of the lighting inside the ship.
the lighting had changed from blue to red just now.
right at that moment, their fake memories and experiences had been triggered and, as a result, they had transformed into pig-sluts.
this switching of their personalities was of great significance.
the nano-machines, which had been embedded inside both these women, weren’t all-purpose.
the nano-machines had merely laid the foundation for the “convenient personality”.
it was only through “experience” that it could flourish.
just like a rehabilitation process was required to restore functions after treatment from an illness, a rehabilitation process was required for this infant personality as well.
if a flawed personality was set into motion, the discrepancies of the original personality wouldn’t disappear and as a result, the brainwashing process would fail.
therefore, the mind had to be meticulously transformed and made to gradually acclimatize to the new personality, by switching it from on to off and from off to on repeatedly.
one could say that this process was similar to prototype testing.
and it was going to commence now.
both these women were customarily referring it to as, 『the public relations mission』.
obviously, there was no such thing.
where in the entire universe did such armed forces exist?
however, the brains of both the women had been remodelled, and thus they were accepting this information as common sense, which we had created as per my demands, as if “it was natural”.
they didn’t suspect that it was being generated from fake memories and experiences, nor could they suspect that it was a product of my intentions to inflict revenge on them.

name: bohgan
normalized: commodore, lieutenant… are we good?
i smirked scornfully.
there was no need to hide it anymore.

name: beatrice
normalized: mm?
ah.
yes…

name: bohgan
normalized: today, as the captain, i would like to ask both of you to perform the public relations mission for me together.

name: beatrice
normalized: what?

name: kila
normalized: along with mother… in a threesome?

name: bohgan
normalized: fufu… as the captain governing the tristan, i need to check the condition of both the meat-toilets.

name: beatrice
normalized: mm… that is quite right.
i understand.

name: kila
normalized: i, too… understand.
beatrice and kila displayed a confused expression, just before responding.
it was a display of resistance by the original personalities of the two women.
however, that was the last of their resistance, and it soon disappeared as their brainwashing continued to progress.

name: bohgan
normalized: is there still a problem?
i will be the one to rob the lieutenant of her virginity――

name: beatrice
normalized: no.
there is no problem whatsoever.

name: kila
normalized: there will no problem.
this time both the women responded with a firm “yes”, without any hesitation.

name: bohgan
normalized: well then, let me guide you to my quarters.
i invited both the women to the captain’s quarters.
my meat-pole had swollen up and was on the verge of bursting, due to the accumulation of my dark desires up to this point.
